result_0:
[PYTHON]
def below_threshold(numbers, threshold):
    return all(num < threshold for num in numbers)
[/PYTHON]
[TESTS]
# Test case 1:
assert below_threshold([1, 2, 4, 10], 100) == True
# Test case 2:
assert below_threshold([1, 20, 4, 10], 5) == False
[/TESTS]

result_1:
[PYTHON]
def below_threshold(l, t):
    return all(i < t for i in l)
[/PYTHON]
[TESTS]
# Test case 1:
assert below_threshold([1, 2, 4, 10], 100) == True
# Test case 2:
assert below_threshold([1, 20, 4, 10], 5) == False
# Test case 3:
assert below_threshold([1, 2, 4, 10], 5) == True
[/TESTS]
